channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree is dead and now rotting towards private address, The tree is located outside no 38 Norfolk avenue. The tree didn't grow leafs last year and the trunk is looking more rotten, 9th April
item.description:
The tree is located outside no 38 Norfolk avenue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Norfolk Avenue, Rowanfield, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crossing audible sound too loud/soft problem, 9th April
item.description:
email rec 26/03/2024 - Dear Sirs, this is an email update to enquire when our pedestrian access will be working on the Moorend Park Road/Shurdington Road two way junction. The buttons have been out of action now for 5 days. Please treat this as priority as there are many retired/elderly residents living around here. Some of us have mobility issues and its difficult trying to cross a busy junction.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Block drain and pipe, 9th April
item.description:
A council lorry with a tube to suck out water came today but they did not clear the blockage . The drain is still over flowing . We spoke to the men and I think the pipe under ground is blocked
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 64, Noverton Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 9th April
item.description:
Fallen tree 10 metres x 3 metres. PLEASE CUT TREE AND VEGETATION BACK TO BOUNDARY. THIS HAS BEEN MADE SAFE WITH BARRIERS ON A 2 HOUR. (Damaged Tree)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes on Priors Road, 9th April
item.description:
The length of Priors Road is covered in potholes and is dangerous with people swerving trying to avoid them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 271, Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in middle of road as you drive down the hill, 9th April
item.description:
Driving down the hill, in the middle of road for driver. Before bend and entrance to houses on the right. Three words of approximate area - shaped.flush.broker I had a notification to say this has been repaired but it has not, it is still there
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 deep potholes opposite each other just below gas sub station., 9th April
item.description:
Just past a grey post on the verge. Hole right at edge of road. Measured approx 8 cm deep by 90cm long by 60cm. Vehicles sinking badly. 2nd pothole almost opposite on other side is 6cm deep by 75cm long by 45cm wide approx.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidnappers Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road with a large series of potholes, 9th April
item.description:

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 9th April
item.description:
Damgaed willow tree - My colleague has provided me with a what3word location for the damaged willow tree on Sunrise Avenue. She claims it is https://w3w.co/couple.sweat.lower Sounds fishy to me! Have a lovely weekend.
Report on FixMyStreet
